website_summaries.verdict: Bitdefender doubles down on guarding your network and IoT devices against attack with its second hardware offering, the Box 2. The latest version brings more power and more features, but at a higher price.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Wireless setup was a doddle. Hardwire proved a little more tempermental. Everything is now setup and 20 odd devices are protected. Although the software installed on the devices themselves is proving more informative, as the Bitbox doesn't have much to say. Port forwarding was not easy to find and the online user guide was not helpful. Good device management and device information. My BT Home Hub 5 didn't like it, until after two reboots and now it's running perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Barrow

customer_reviews.title: Preventing the hackers, spies and thieves. Well Done Bitdefender!
customer_reviews.text: Unless you are good with tech you will probably need the assistance from Bitdefender Support to set up your new Bitdefender Box 2 correctly. But once you've done that you will probably realise and agree with me what a FANTASTIC tool this is: all internet connected devices in your home gets protected without limit. I recommend Bitdefender Box 2, 1,000,000,000,000% !!! Probably the best investments in your online security and safety that you'll ever make!
customer_reviews.author: DH (London)

customer_reviews.title: Good bit of kit but takes a while to settle
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great peice of kit but isn’t the easiest to install. My Netgear Nighthawk router refuses to work with it so I’m using my old Linksys. It took a couple of days for my SureSignal to work and my CCTV to connect. The Box 2 also keeps mysteriously disconnecting (spinning red light) then just connects and of it goes. I can only presume it’s updating - but perhaps it should wait to 3am to do that?!
customer_reviews.author: FA-F

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, value for money and makes you feel secure.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. Easy setup and the online/email support is fast. It’s already blocking fishing attempts! Updates are automatic and new features have already been added to the software. Really good and worth the annual fee.
customer_reviews.author: JonnyD

customer_reviews.title: Works great - No issues
customer_reviews.text: I've been reading up on the vulnerabilities of all of the smart devices in my house and wanted to find something easy and secure to protect me and my family. After some research we decided on the Box 2. Set up was simple, it recognized all of my devices, hasn't slowed down the network and has a nice interactive app. Pretty much exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Rabdomant

customer_reviews.title: Please Read
customer_reviews.text: The product works as described, however it is tricky to setup even after following the instructions. Buying this product does theoretically give bitdefender access to your network traffic as it needs this to function properly. Its also worth mentioning this product isnt designed to work as a standalone router, although built in wifi is available if required. Overall it does what it says on the tin, however dont expect it to be 'hack proof' rather a good means of defending the average home from well known attacks. There is also an £79 annual fee after your first year of use. I presume this is in-line with other AV products of this nature, however its worth considering this before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Chronic

customer_reviews.title: I don’t see any difference in the security that my current router gives me vs this router
customer_reviews.text: VPN is not secure when I’ve typed in my VPN IP address it still shows which service my providers with and it still shows my current location. It also says that you can protect all your devices so it allowed me to send a link to download and install the app on my phone but for some reason even though you’ve paid for the boxing you should have 12 months free subscription that charges me after a month
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered via Prime as we wanted to protect the internet-connected devices in our flat. Set up took longer than 10 minutes, but a call to customer support got us sorted straight away. We travel frequently in the EU for work and holiday and as a result are always using airport wifi so the VPN was a huge selling point
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Secures all items in your household under one device.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered promptly. Good instruction leaflet. Had one small headache setting up, probably my fault but support very helpful. In the world of connected houses, this is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: andrew g

customer_reviews.title: Increased Security worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for mobile phone, wifi, computer all in 1. Great kit, increased feeling of security!
customer_reviews.author: GuitarEvolution

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all cost
customer_reviews.text: Extremely flaky product. Parental controls do not work on apple devices, built in firewall blocks apple app store etc. Support nonexistent. Avoid at all cost.
customer_reviews.author: Henri Timmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great to have peace of mind with more cyber security issues
customer_reviews.text: With BOX...so far so good. I was a tad apprehensive but I'm happy at the moment with my decision. Not using a mesh router setup so install was fine. I'll update this if my experience changes
customer_reviews.author: Simon B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product - easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Hi, this product arrived on time and in a nice package. Instructions were clear and installation went smoothly. Internet usage seems not impacted by the device - speed etc as good as it was before.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing box
customer_reviews.text: Amazing security device. For the money this box is perfect! The sandbox when making payments online is so cool.... and the phishing attempts this box stops on a daily bases is crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Lorri haines

customer_reviews.title: The reliability of bitdefender box.
customer_reviews.text: A superb piece of device, fast and reliable reliable, which meet my needs. I have every confidence in it's ability to protect my devices.t
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Devonish

customer_reviews.title: WARMNING: UK renewal not possible
customer_reviews.text: All great for the first year, good product. However, it's not posisble for UK customers to renew the license (payment only possible with a US card). Customer support not able to assist "we don't know what to tell you.". No point in buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does what is says in the box.
customer_reviews.text: Setup with a Virgin Media Hub 3.0 in modem mode, went smoothly following Bitdefender app instructions. A couple of weeks in, it'd been performing as expected. Port forwarding configured for some devices and all smart devices working as expected. Low latency maintained and powerful WiFi signal. Also, it's nice looking so I don't mind having it out on the top instead of being hidden away. That'll help it keep cool and maximize the WiFi signal. So, all good at the moment. Hopefully it continues to perform well...
customer_reviews.author: A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Top quality product
customer_reviews.text: Works very well although I had do some manual setting up on my Sky router
customer_reviews.author: W C Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Safe and secure
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and works without any issues
customer_reviews.author: eddie f

product_meta.title: Bitdefender Box 2 - Connected Home Cybersecurity Hub - Plug into Your Personal Router
feature_bullets: UNLIMITED PROTECTION AND SUPPORT: Bitdefender BOX 2 plugs into your (Non-Mesh/Non-Google Wi-Fi) router and protects an unlimited number of Wi-Fi and internet connected devices using Total Security Unlimited. Bitdefender BOX 2 includes unlimited

ADVANCED THREAT DEFENSE: Our full-featured, cross-platform network security suite ensures all your Windows, Mac, iOS, Android, and IoT devices are fully protected. This includes: Real-Time Data Protection, Multi-Layer Malware and Ransomware Protection, Social Network Protection, Game/Movie/Work Modes, Microphone Monitor, Webcam Protection, Anti-Tracker, Password Manager, File Shredder, Secured Online Banking and Shopping, Parental Controls and much more

NETWORK DETECTION AND OPTIMIZATION: Bitdefender BOX 2 automatically detects and optimizes all the devices on your network during the first 48-hour post-install window. During this 48-hour period, your network may slow down. Once complete, experience a fully protected network with speeds up to 1 Gbps thanks to the 1.2 GHz Dual Core processor and dual 1 Gbps ethernet ports

AP ACCESS/BRIDGE MODE: Prior to purchase, please ensure that your router (should you choose to use an additional router) can be configured to AP (Access Point) or Bridge Mode otherwise Bitdefender BOX 2 may experience compatibility issues

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Broadband Internet Connection (Cable/DSL/UTP), 3G/4G data connection, iOS 10 or higher, or Android 4.4 or higher. Please note: a mobile device is required to set up and monitor Bitdefender BOX
